title: VNMKV Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Vasantrao Naik Marathwada Krishi Vidyapeeth (VNMKV) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA, Ph.D. , Post-graduation, B.Sc, can apply for the VNMKV Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age lim...
